name: Pathsala Satsang Vihar
history: Sree Sree Borda (12-02-1979), Inagurataed by Acharyadev Sree Sree Dada on 06-03-1987.  Puj. Rangama, Puj. Bara Baudi, Puj. Mejda & Meja Baudi, Rev. Babaida, Rev. Sipaida, Rev. Binkida visited this place.
address:
Vill/City .-Pathsala,P.O.- Pathsala, P.S.- Patacharkuchi , 
Dist.- BARPETA ,  
PIN- 781325 ,  Assam , India
near: Pathsala Rly Stn. / Pathsala Bus Stand / Guwahati Airport
details:
Acharya Bhawan (5 rooms), Guest House (4rooms).
Road distance from Simlaguri - 30 kms.

name: Simlaguri Satsang Vihar
history: Inaugurated on June 1979. Acharyadev Sree Sree Dada visited on 03-02-1987, 06-03-1987, 06-03-1998 (along with His Family), 30-03-1998 (again along with His Family), 30-05-2005 (Inauguration for Acharya Bhawan was held this time), 03-07-2005 & on 10-07-2005  respectively. Rev. Babaida on 04-08-2001, Rev. Sipaida & Bauranima on 30-07-2004 visited the place. Rev. Binkida on 28-1-2013 (Inaugurated Sri Bigraha), 07-02-2013 & on 15-02-2013 visited.
address:
Vill/City .-Simlaguri,P.O.- Barpeta Road, P.S.- Barpeta Road , 
Dist.- BARPETA ,  
PIN- 781315 ,  Assam , India
near: Barpeta Road Rly Stn. / Barpeta Bus Stand.
details: Acharya Bhawan (6rooms), Hall for Anandabazar, Guest House(8rooms), Store Rooms.
